thread.title: Will book every trip to NY here!
thread.title_full: Will book every trip to NY here! - Review of Distrikt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BarbraShoffner
title: Will book every trip to NY here!
text: My daughter and I booked a last minute 2 full day trip. I happened upon Distrikt Hotel by accident. It was a fabulous accident. It's beautiful, clean and modern. Hospitality is wonderful. Make it part of your trip to visit College, the Bistro and bar within the hotel. Try the "Foxy Lady" or the "Snow White" signature cocktail. You won't be disappointed. Everything a tourist would want is just around every corner in walking distance.
